products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Steel Electric Roller Blind
products.description: If you like contemporary style then this roller blind is sure to complement your space. The boheme steel double sided blackout electric roller blind combines user-friendly convenience with sharp good looks to enhance your everyday. The grey and white leaf motif is printed on both sides of this blackout blind so the look can be admired from the outside too. The electric design ensures easy one-touch, remote adjustment.

products.title: Sephora Steel Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Sephora, a beautiful leafy design, available in 4 soft tones. This grey patterned roller blind has a stunning design inspired by feathers and leaves so will add a nature-like feel to any room in your home. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and ideal for for difficult to reach windows. products.title: Vesper Lunar Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their semi-translucent vesper range, meshes stylish striped opaque and see-though stripes, with colour favourites to create a truly stunning finish. Vesper vesper grey electric roller blinds are modern and stylish, and the light streaming through the voile stripes makes for a beautiful effect. Their chain-free electric rollers are not only futuristic, but are also child-safe by design. Why not upgrade to include a smart home hub - and integrate with your google home hub or amazon alexa device.

products.title: Treviso Shadow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their amazing treviso blind range is available in 6 on trend colours that complement the beautiful tree pattern. This grey roller blind has an eye-catching tree pattern and a metallic finish which will add style and elegance to any room in your home. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows. products.title: Sio Charcoal Electric Roller Blind
products.description: This sophisticated charcoal blind is decorated with graceful golden stems giving a sense of the exotic. This motif is especially fitting for glamorous bedrooms, living spaces and stylish studies. Made using fantastic blackout fabric and an electric operated roller design, the sio charcoal electric roller blind can help you create a sense of laid-back luxury within whichever room you use it. products.title: Birdsong Midnight Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The birdsong midnight electric roller blind displays a cheerful motif of stylised trees and birds in a grey, gold and white colour palette. This window blind provides both striking decoration and a convenient solution for shading your windows with the one-touch remote control. What is more, the fabric is pollergen treated fabric and helps to reduce active pollen circulation in your home. products.title: Avoca Vega Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Add a little luxury to your living space with the avoca vega electric roller blind. The sleek and compact design is ideal for homes with a modern and minimalist vibe, whilst the dark grey botanical print brings a sophisticated touch. This blind will aid with shade and privacy in any room and the electric control is great for windows in hard to reach positions. products.title: Marlow Blackout Steel Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Marlow blackout is a sophisticated fabric with quite earthy tones. It has a blackout feature that gives you complete control over the light coming into your room. This attractive blackout roller blind in grey colour is the great way to add more style to any room. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. products.title: Palace Blackout Onyx Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Add some sumptuous drama into your living area, dining room or bedroom with palace blackout onyx grey electric roller blind which dresses up a window no end. On a soft, whispery grey background, the design features generous paisley swirls interspersed with curvaceous flowers to give a sophisticated look to any space. Made from blackout fabric, light wont travel into your room when the blind is closed.

products.title: Marble Pvc Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The marble silver blackout electric roller blind boasts an elegant design that will bring your interior right up to date. The premium blackout fabric is printed with a graceful pattern of silver-grey marble detail on white and will look light, fresh and luxurious in a range of spaces. With this practical electric model you can sit black, relax, and lower the shade at the touch of a button. products.title: Addict Terrazzo Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The pico mustard roller blind has a warm and sunny appeal with a twist of retro style that will look great teamed with rich jewel tones and mid-century furnishings. The smart geometric print of white triangles is printed on mustard coloured, pollergen treated fabric that will give enhanced comfort in your home or work space. products.title: Whitby Blackout Pvc Stone Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, whitby blackout pvc stone grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. With a blackout fabric and a flame-retardant finish, its a great choice and the electric operation means its so easy to open and close. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean.

products.title: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Loras blackout melody grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches its a serene design that will gain many compliments. This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen, a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.
